title: Wong Chun Yue
text:
Wong Chun Yue (; born 28 January 1978 in <a href="British%20Hong%20Kong">Hong Kong</a>) is a <a href="Hong%20Kong%20people">Hong Kong</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> coach and a former professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> player.
Wong played as a <a href="Midfielder%23Winger">right winger</a> and he sometimes plays as a <a href="Striker%20%28association%20football%29">striker</a> as well.
Workable FC.
On 19 January 2008, Wong scored the winning goal in a <a href="Hong%20Kong%20League%20Cup%202007-08">League Cup</a> match against his previous club <a href="South%20China%20AA">South China</a>.
Honours.
Club career.
"As of 19 May 2007"
